name: Metatron Metaverse
description:
Metatron Metaverse is a hive of communities that are engaging in events and activities in a 3D space where its main purpose is to build curated digital society with various interests and experiences.

Join our alpha version experience and enjoy the events that we are going to host during the upcoming 2 months.

For more info please stay tuned on our social media accounts:

Twitte: https://twitter.com/Metatron_sifor

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/metatron.metaverse/
